# tf.keras.losses.cosine


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/keras/losses.py#L1062-L1075">

Computes the cosine similarity between labels and predictions.

### Aliases:

* <a href="/api_docs/python/tf/keras/losses/cosine"><code>tf.compat.v1.keras.losses.cosine</code></a>

``` python
tf.keras.losses.cosine(
    y_true,
    y_pred,
    axis=-1
)
```
